Message.Title: BofA Seen Doling Out $10 Billion for Dividends, Buybacks
Message.Msg: Bloomberg 11/19/2012 The lender has improved capital by the most among the biggest U.S. banks and could fare comparatively well after Federal Reserve stress tests, Ed Najarian, an ISI analyst, said yesterday in a research note. Bank of America may have the equivalent of about $30 billion in capital beyond the minimum required by regulators, he wrote. “We certainly don’t expect Bank of America to return anywhere near $30 billion in capital,” said Najarian, who has a buy rating on the Charlotte, North Carolina-based company. “We still think $5 billion to $10 billion in total dividends and stock buybacks is likely for 2013, which would still be an upside surprise versus Street expectations.”

Message.Title: Libya's Benghazi Security Chief Accidentally Killed..
Message.Msg: TRIPOLI, Libya (AP) — Libya's deputy interior minister says gunmen assassinated the security chief of the eastern city of Benghazi overnight. However, the Obama Administration immediately declared that it was the work of nice, but sensitive, folks who had gathered to protest an America video. To make clear there is absolutely misunderstanding concerning Omar’s untimely and accidental death, U. S. Ambassador Susan Rice will appear on five Sunday morning television networks to assure the American public that “we have Al-Queda on the run.” Rice said, “I don’t know anything about Benghazi, but Barrack felt I could do the best job of making it totally clear these nice folks, who were protesting a video when Omar was accidentally killed, are simply victims of color and don’t deserve the blame for Omar’s death.”

Message.Title: Let Hollywood or David Letterman cover the costs.
Message.Msg: President Barack Obama's fundraising advisers have urged the White House to accept corporate donations for his January 2013 inaugural celebration rather than rely exclusively on weary donors who underwrote his $1 billion re-election effort. People involved in his re-election campaign said White House staff and campaign advisers have been debating whether to accept corporate money to stage the events but haven't made a final decision. The Joint Congressional Committee on Inaugural Ceremonies is responsible for the official swearing-in. Taxpayers pick up the tab for security and the costs connected to the ceremony on the west front of the Capitol, while Obama supporters cover various inaugural balls, concerts and parties.

Topic.Title: When Is It OK to Raise the Debt Ceiling?

Message.Msg: Raise the Debt ceiling by $1 Trillion Now for Only Infrastructure Spending. Build schools, repair roads and bridges now and that would put over 3 Million Americans back to work. Since 1980 we have fallen behind by $9 Trillion on needed Infrastructure spending, almost 50% of the bridges in this country are in need of repair, if we don't, we will pay with loss of life in the end. Cut the Defense budget in half and spend that money on Infrastructure projects, we don't need 2,000 Nukes. Build a High Speed Rail system, we are the last country to have one. There is no longer a train that goes between Florida to Nevada, parts of the tracks were lost from Hurricane Katrina in 2005, no repairs have been made, Nothing from Congress.

Topic.Title: When Is It OK to Raise the Debt Ceiling?

Message.Msg: There is No Private healthcare that covers as much as Medicare, start by cutting things like $7,000 electric wheelchairs and get rid of Medicare Advantage, that costs and extra $400 Billion a year, passed in 2003. Those programs were made to support business profits from Tax dollars. Any one of us could cut a Trillion dollars from the budget every years, each person in Congress has their own pet project that wastes money, the Defense budget are loaded with them. We don't have a lowest bidder system for Government Work, start one. Your children and grandchildren will not be paying much of anything to the debt, nothing but wasted talking points. Infrastructure Spending creates Jobs, more jobs increase the tax base to Gov and that will reduce what each person has to pay in Taxes. Cut all Social Services for anyone illegal, that is anyone without a Social Security Number, gets nothing..No Food stamps, No Unemployment Payments, No Gov Gifts. Right now we have Millions of people collecting Total Disability while they are out on the Golf Course every week. Every person on Disability should only be paid for what percent of Disability they have, 10%, 50%, 80%, 100%. I know someone with a Bad Knee on Full Disability, he walks better than I do. I know someone else who goes fishing on his big boat every week and he is on Full Disability, I still can't figure out for what.. I also know a Cop who is on Full Pension because she has Nerve Damage in her Trigger finger, I'M not kidding, I know that is a union pension but we do pay for it in the end.. So lets not pick on the poor and the people making $10 per hour, I'm OK with them not paying anything, you can't get blood out of stone.. Every Person making over $50,000 should pay No Less than 25% in Taxes for anything over that.. No body making Millions should pay less because of deductions. I am not a Liberal, I pay 33% in taxes because I live in America and I worked my #$%$ off my whole life, I never collected Unemployment, I only bought American Made cars to support American jobs, I don't expect any American to compete with workers in China or Mexico because Americans live better than any of them,,we have more...we expect more and we pay for better.

Message.Title: The GREEDY, the BAD and the UGLY
Message.Msg: Mr. GEKKO: (WALL STREET)......... The point is, ladies and gentleman, that greed -- for lack of a better word -- is good. Greed is right. Greed works. Greed clarifies, cuts through, and captures the essence of the evolutionary spirit. Greed, in all of its forms -- greed for life, for money, for love, knowledge -- has marked the upward surge of mankind. And greed -- you mark my words -- will not only save Teldar Paper, but that other malfunctioning corporation called the USA.

Topic.Title: Why Do Right Wing Wackos Use BAC Message Board To Spew Their Nonsense?

Message.Msg: It's been this way for a LOOOOOOONG time with Mason and his gang hijacking this forum years ago....See below for an oldie but goodie.... You have stumbled upon what you mistakenly thought was a BAC financial message board. Unfortunately, it is not. It is, however, open for any other topic of discussion you would like, with particular emphasis on the Iraq war, both pro and con, politics in general, as well as religious topics of any kind. Bad poetry and boring travelogs are also welcome, as well as daily diaries of your personal activities and medical history. DO NOT, however, post anything even remotely related to BAC or finance or the markets. Posting any kind of on-topic, BAC or finance or market related posts will get buried by the resident gang crap that has hijacked this forum. Of particualar annoyance lately has been yellowratchimp/gutlesswhatever/shockertoyounumber/blubbering_billy_idiot/the_idiot_foreigner, and its latest incarnation, chimpbushidiot. It has attempted to take over this forum for it's own particular brand of left-wing, anti-American propoganda. The only posters that read its crap are honourmydick/starswithoutbrains/rememberwhenihadalife, and libertydujour. As a matter of fact, they may very well be all the same poster, along with JoeKent, donut/fruitcake/prawndujour, stanluboffanynumberwilldo...(See The Theory of JoeKent and the Gang...) Consider yourself warned, and proceed at your own risk! This board is always, however, good for sarcasm & witticisms... Good luck. Later... SW
